ENTERPRISE INNOVATION

UBTECH is bringing cutting edge robotics to the enterprise landscape by leading the development of proprietary technology and applications. As one of the most valuable AI and Robotics company in the world with a robust R&D foundation, UBTECH’s commitment to the future of a robot for every business is unmatched.

button_text_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

ADIBOT IN THE CLASSROOM

An easily transportable, UV-C robot that can be where you need it most, when you need it most. With locking omni wheels, long extension cords, daisy chain capability for simultaneous, multiple robot usage, multiple cooling vents and included safety accessories, the ADIBOT-S model is the optimal solution for disinfection needs like school classrooms or common areas.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”ADIBOT” image=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/EnterpriseRobot_2.jpg” image_as_background=”off” button_text=”Learn More” button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wcm9kdWN0Iiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjEwMjYyIn19@” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h1″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”20px” button_border_radius=”12px” button_use_icon=”on” button_icon=”%%198%%” button_on_hover=”off” button_alignment=”center” header_font_size_last_edited=”off|phone” button_text_size_tablet=”” button_text_size_phone=”16px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

ADIBOT IN MEDICAL ENVIRONMENTS

First-Rate Safety at all Times with the ADIBOT-A. ADIBOT can assist the sanitization process in hospitals, clinics, or doctor’s offices while taking the right precautions on safety. ADIBOT-A is equipped with key safety features that ensure pre-programmed disinfection routes are taking the precautions needed. These safety features include: a “first-person” point of view front facing camera, PIR motion sensor to detect human movement through body heat, 2-way audio notification and an emergency stop button.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”ADIBOT” image=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/EnterpriseRobot_3.jpg” image_as_background=”off” button_text=”Learn More” button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wcm9kdWN0Iiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjEwMjYyIn19@” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h1″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”20px” button_border_radius=”12px” button_use_icon=”on” button_icon=”%%198%%” button_on_hover=”off” button_alignment=”center” header_font_size_last_edited=”off|phone” button_text_size_tablet=”” button_text_size_phone=”16px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

ADIBOT IN DENTAL OFFICES

Our ADIBOT robots contain powerful UV-C Disinfection. Our robots utilize eight high powered, mercury-based UV-C bulbs, and ADIBOT-S emits a total irradiance of 3,160µW/cm2 (max.) that works to effectively disinfect 99.9% of areas. ADIBOT-S for places that need to sanitize quickly and efficiently in between patients like a dental office.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”CRUZR” image=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/EnterpriseRobot_4.jpg” image_as_background=”off” button_text=”Learn More” button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wcm9kdWN0Iiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjEwMjcyIn19@” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h1″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”20px” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_border_radius=”12px” button_use_icon=”on” button_icon=”%%198%%” button_on_hover=”off” button_alignment=”center” header_font_size_last_edited=”off|phone” button_text_size_tablet=”” button_text_size_phone=”16px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

SMART RETAIL

EASY HOME

At Easy Home, China’s #1 home renovation and decoration store, Cruzr promotes products, offers discounts and provides directions throughout the store giving customers a unique shopping experience.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”CRUZR” image=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/EnterpriseRobot_5.jpg” image_as_background=”off” button_text=”Learn More” button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wcm9kdWN0Iiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjEwMjcyIn19@” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h1″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”20px” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_border_radius=”12px” button_use_icon=”on” button_icon=”%%198%%” button_on_hover=”off” button_alignment=”center” header_font_size_last_edited=”off|phone” button_text_size_tablet=”” button_text_size_phone=”16px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

YONGHUI SUPERMARKETS

SMART PERSONAL SHOPPER (SMART SHOPPING)

At Yonghui Superstores, a national grocery store chain, Cruzr recommends uses object recognition to recommend wine pairings for shoppers.

YOUR END-TO-END ROBOTICS PARTNER

From assessing your business needs to integrating with your current technology to providing real-time analytics after you’ve deployed, UBTECH is your comprehensive robotics solution partner.
